B

Backo - Class in com.segment.backo
Backo implements the "full jitter" backoff policy as described in this article Exponential Backoff And Jitter .
Backo.Builder - Class in com.segment.backo
Fluent API to construct instances of Backo.
backoff(int) - Method in class com.segment.backo.Backo
Return the duration (in milliseconds) for which you should backoff.
base(TimeUnit, long) - Method in class com.segment.backo.Backo.Builder
Set the initial backoff interval.
build() - Method in class com.segment.backo.Backo.Builder
Build a Backo instance.
builder() - Static method in class com.segment.backo.Backo
Return a builder to construct instances of Backo.

C

cap(TimeUnit, long) - Method in class com.segment.backo.Backo.Builder
Set the maximum backoff.
com.segment.backo - package com.segment.backo
 

F

factor(int) - Method in class com.segment.backo.Backo.Builder
Set the backoff factor.

J

jitter(int) - Method in class com.segment.backo.Backo.Builder
Set the backoff jitter.

S

sleep(int) - Method in class com.segment.backo.Backo
Sleeps for the duration returned by Backo.backoff(int).
